title: FinTech Avenger
author: FinTech Avenger
content: Hello to all forum members and guests!I have a shelf (already registered and licensed) Polish VASP (Virtual Assets Service Provider), also referred informally as cryptolicense, available for immediate acquisition with full nominee service (EU citizen acting as director/shareholder/UBO available for immediate acquisition.Highlights:- Polish company registered in 2022- No bank or exchange accounts, no customers, contracts, liabilities for your safety- VASP registration permitting to conduct exchange services from crypto to fiat, vice versa, exchange between cryptos, custody of cryptoassets- EU nominee acting as director/shareholder/UBO who can stay or leave the company as per your requirements, already included in priceÂ Popular use cases:- Fiat to crypto on-off ramp for FOREX, crypto casinos, DeFi projects- Crypto exchange and crypto wallet operations- Crypto Lending- OTC desks and legitimate B2P trading on Localcryptos, Binance P2P, Paxful etc.and more...Price of the company with nominee services for 1 year is 34,500 EUR. Additional shareholders or new director/shareholder/UBO can be added at no additional cost. Looking for swift sale.I can also help with opening and verification of exchange and electronic money accounts at additional cost (starting from 1,000 EUR).Get in touch with me at: Telegram: @fintechops (https://t.me/fintechops)Signal: +46 73 726 77 84QTOX: ACCFB7601BCC47981FAFEDCFF72BD1067F828E59E85394B863094B268AAC915B6E19D4AC97EB
